statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity >= 10 AND sale_amount < 500;
SELECT order_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM sales_data WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY order_date ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_id ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount <= 500 AND quantity < 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, order_id DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE units_sold > 10;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, units_sold, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT product_name, units_sold, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number, address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT id, product_name, units_sold, sales_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY total_sale DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, total_sale FROM sales WHERE quantity > 5 AND sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY category ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM products;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50;

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email, products.product_name, transactions.sale_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN sales ON transactions.sale_id = sales.sale_id JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT product_name, price, category, sale_date FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, sale_date FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category LIKE 'C%' AND price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(customer_name) > 10 ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM trends WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
